text:
With wyona's design goal to be very user friendly - how would you efficiently
support multi-lingual sites?

I have posted some ideas for forrest as per the above URL...

I guess it would be great to mention something about this in
http://www.wyona.org/docs/xdocs/usr-create.html


------- Additional Comments From Andreas Kuckartz 2003-02-28 23:12 -------

Roadmap says:
"Feature Set: Implement multilingual capabilities"
for version 1.4

------- Additional Comments From Ralf Hauser 2003-03-01 14:19 -------

Currently, I am doing it with m4 (http://www.gnu.org/manual/m4-1.4/m4.html)
myself, but I guess I will migrate to http://vpp.sourceforge.net.

http://www.wyona.org/roadmap.html#1.4 looks good.

How about adding a search function to your website such that I could search for
a term such as "multi-lingual" (see
http://cvs.wyona.org/cgi-bin/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=87)
creator: gregor@apache.org
